dialog.name: hello
dialog.message: Thank you for finding my notes earlier. Would you be interested in an extra writing pen?

dialog.name: ::buyitem
dialog.message: Would you like to buy this top-quality writing pen?

dialog.name: ::boughtitem
dialog.message: Here you go dear, a top-quality writing pen!

dialog.name: ::fail_money
dialog.message: Oh dear, it seems you don't have enough money!

dialog.name: ::fail_weight
dialog.message: Oh dear, you're not strong enough to hold this tiny writing pen?

part.name: Finding the Notes
part.info: Lairwenn has lost her notes somewhere in the Brynknot Library and she has asked you to find them for her, as she can't finish the document she is working on without them.

dialog.name: hello
dialog.message: Welcome to the Brynknot Library... I'm {npc.name}, the librarian.
Please excuse me, I seem to have lost my notes somewhere...

dialog.name: lostnotes
dialog.message: I hurriedly put them away while searching for this book, and then a while later I remembered about the notes but I can't find them now! And I really need them to finish this document I'm working on...

response.message: Can I help you in your search?

dialog.name: helpsearch
dialog.message: I would certainly appreciate it my dear! The notes are somewhere in this library, I just can't seem to find them...

dialog.name: hello
dialog.message: I'm trying to remember where I put them, but I just can't... Please continue your search my dear, they should be somewhere in this library...

dialog.name: hello
dialog.message: They were in the luggage on the top floor? How curious... Well, thank you my dear! I think I have something here that may be useful on your adventures... Now, where did I put it...
Just pulling your leg my dear! Here it is, a writing pen will be useful, will it not?
